citations.narrative:
There were 3 food bowls and one water bowl that had chewed edges that were rough with sharp points.
Sharp points on food and water bowls may cause injury to the dogs.
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they have no sharp points that could injure the dogs.
Correct by: November 13, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

Primary enclosures. 
There were 3 food bowls and one water bowl that had chewed edges that were rough with sharp points. 
Sharp points on food and water bowls may cause injury to the dogs. 
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they have no sharp points that could injure the dogs.

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
